description:
Led by bassist Lukas Kranzelbinder, the band's unique 7-piece setup--featuring
two drummers, two bass players, and three horns--creates a signature sound.
With five albums, including LILA (2023), and multiple awards, Shake Stew
continues to captivate audiences worldwide with their fiery live performances.
name: LILA By Shake Stew

performer.description: Austrian band Shake Stew has become a sensation since their 2016 debut at the Saalfelden Jazz festival. Known for their high-energy mix of kraut-jazz and hypnotic grooves, they’ve gained widespread success across Europe and beyond.
performer.name: LILA By Shake Stew

description:
A prodigious Carnatic musician, Varijashree bridges Indian classical and
global music with her remarkable voice and improvisational skill. Trio Bobo
and Varijashree collaborate to create a mesmerizing fusion of intricate
rhythms and soulful melodies.
name: Trio Bobo Ft. Varijashree Venugopal

performer.description: Trio Bobo featuring Christian Meyer (drums), Faso (bass), and Alessio Menconi (guitar) blends jazz, African rhythms, and progressive rock with technical brilliance and infectious energy. Their albums Pepper Games (2016) and Sensurround (2019) highlight their genre-blending sound. The album Sensurround features special collaborations with pianist Stefano Bollani and vocalist Varijashree Venugopal, adding new dimensions to their music.
performer.name: Trio Bobo Ft. Varijashree Venugopal
